H0.text: host of the late show who was once a correspondent for the daily show. Stephen Colbert

H1.text: host of the late show who was once a correspondent for the daily show. Jon Stewart

H2.text: host of the late show who was once a correspondent for the daily show. Brian Unger

H3.text: host of the late show who was once a correspondent for the daily show. Craig Kilborn

A4.text: Colbert's work as a correspondent on Comedy Central's news-parody series The Daily Show gained him wide recognition.

A5.text: After Kilborn left the show prior to the 1999 season, Jon Stewart took over hosting duties, also serving as a writer and co-executive producer.

A6.text: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert is an American late-night news talk show hosted by Stephen Colbert, which premiered on September 8, 2015.

A7.text: Jon Stewart, former host of Colbert's previous sister program The Daily Show, who is credited as executive producer.
